name: Snack Size Sunflower Brittle
description:
This sunflower brittle is extra yummy - It is light and airy, not hard as a rock.  The recipe is a very concise recipe developed by a Western Kansas High Plains farm wife.  I happened upon this recipe when I purchased a vintage cookbook made on a spirit duplicator by a group of women whose husbands were sunflower farmers in Sherman County Kansas.  

I hand stir all my brittle in small batches, just like the farm women of previous generations.  

~ Wholesale Inquiries Welcome ~

name: 1 lb. Fresh Made Sunflower Brittle
description:
